Module nl.meron.yaeger
Package nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity

Class JavaFXEntity

  • java.lang.Object
    • nl.meron.yaeger.engine.entities.entity.JavaFXEntity
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Anchorable, Bounded, Entity, NodeProvider, Placeable, Removeable, Rotatable, SceneChild, Initializable, DimensionsProvider, WithTimerList
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    RectangleEntity, SpriteEntity, TextEntity
    public abstract class JavaFXEntity
extends Object
implements Entity
    A JavaFXEntity can be used to display anything that is a child of a Node.

        Description copied from interface: Anchorable
        Set the AnchorPoint of this Placeable. The AnchorPoint will be used to set the given x, y-coordinate. By default a Placeable will use the top-left as its anchor-point.
